stripped_text: Whenever the Corp creates a server, they lose 1 credit. Whenever you make a successful run on Archives, you may trash this hardware. If you do, the Corp loses 3 credits.
text:
Whenever the Corp creates a server, they lose 1[credit].
Whenever you make a successful run on Archives, you may trash this hardware. If you do, the Corp loses 3[credit].
title: Hijacked Router
